data.name: 长天 Long Sky
data.detailed_description:
This game was developed using Unity's next-generation graphics rendering pipeline "HDRP".

I am a personal developer who develops the games I want to achieve by continually learning programming knowledge. When you were playing 2D arcade flight shooting game, did you think about these two questions: "What is the small spaceship below thinking? What does the world it sees?" Based on these two questions, I developed This game. Please look forward to "Long Sky" is a small arcade flight avoidance game that can switch the first person perspective. It has the characteristics of fast, easy, tight, repeatable play, and has the elements of collection and challenge.Your only goal in the game is to constantly break the score records you created before. I am very grateful for the feedback and bug report.

仿生梦



  • Control your spacecraft movement from the first person perspective to avoid or destroy all obstacles.
  • Control your spacecraft movements from a third-person perspective to avoid or destroy all obstacles.
  • Free or timed switching of the first and third person perspectives.
  • Earn higher points and unlock new spaceships and special effects badges.




  • A casual game that experiences the effects of this generation of graphics.
  • Easy to learn arcade game, smooth game operation experience, keyboard or keyboard + mouse, as you choose.
  • The game's rhythm is super fast, and it's addictive to constantly challenge past scores.
  • Unlock more feature ships and unlock more special effects badges. Let your high scores pay off in appearance.
  • Endless play mode, only you can stop yourself from playing.
  • Steam achievements, leaderboard support!
  • Steam cloud support, unlocked spacecraft, special effects badges will not be lost.
  • Now available in Chinese, English, Russian, German, French, Portuguese, Spanish, Polish and Korean.
  • Provides free and timed modes to provide a shortcut for technical players seeking high scores.

This page has been translated using Google Translate, please let me know if there is any error description. thanks for your help.

data.short_description: "Long Sky" is a small arcade flight avoidance game that can switch the first person perspective. It has the characteristics of fast, easy, tight, repeatable play, and has the elements of collection and challenge.
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Polish, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil
data.reviews:
“Well I have to say I enjoy this game when I normally do not enjoy space shooter games. The idea of going first person in the middle of the game makes for a challenge. The background for the game I like as Im a fan of space backgrounds. A+”
TPG RuneSnow

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
